attributes.action: UNION flag be flown from all Scottish Public buildings, and not the EU Flag
attributes.additional_details: The SNP Government have stated, that in future, only the EU flag will be flown on Public Buildings in Scotland, and that the UK (Union) Flag, will only be flown on remembrance days. We (the Petitioners) do not think this is acceptable, and is for political purposes only, ie. the Independance movement, promoted by the SNP and it's followers.
attributes.background: Insist that the Scottish Assembly, comply with the wishes of the petitioners, and that of the UK Government, and fly ONLY the official UK flag of our United Kingdom on Public Buildings.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual businesses and property owners in Scotland, not the UK Government or Parliament.
